类型: Size: 11.5 Wide Little KidColor: Blue and White
评论详情: I had high hopes for these shoes as I have tried some of the other shoes like these and loved them. My son is autistic and cannot tie his shoes so we have to go with velcro and we are always on the hunt for stylish velcro shoes. I definitely like wider shoes as they are more roomy and easier to get on. Right off the bat these looked cheap to me. I do like they are light weight but the other barefoot shoes did not look this cheap. Second, these have no loop on the back of the shoe to help slip them on. They are impossible for me to get on my sons foot. I got these because they are supposed to be easier to put on but they are the worst. Lastly, I just did not like the tag that says "Fashion" it just looks strange. I thought about cutting it off but when I could not get them on my sons foot anyway, I figured I was just going to donate them. These are a no for me. If I can't get them on easily then they just aren't worth it.

评论详情: While I do like the casual look of these shoes, they look bulky on my son's narrow feet. However, he finds them comfortable. For reference, my 5 yrs old son wears size 12 in Nike sneakers. The material is soft, with nice faux elastic laces, the foam insole provides good cushioning, and they are also removable, so you can replace them with comfortable ones. The only downside are the velcro straps, which seem a bit flimsy. Despite being hemmed along the trim, the edges are already showing signs of wear after just a few hours of wearing them out and about. Overall, these are comfortable, and the quality is good, but the straps could be improved.

评论概述: Comfortable, Easy to wear, Clean cut shoes,

My son tested the shoes out, he runs and jumps with them and they were kid approved. My son says his shoes are comfortable and he likes to wear them to school, when he is bicycling and when he rides his scooter. All in all, good shoes, I hope they will last as my son is a very active 7 year old.

I also like the look of having the laces, but also having the Velcro for easy on and off. They are a size too big for our two-year-old, but it won’t be long before he grows into them. I can’t wait for him to be able to wear them!!!

评论概述: Cute, comfortable, but not high quality.
类型: Size: 11.5 Wide Little KidColor: Grey Brown
评论详情: Got these cute shoes for my 5 year old. They are true to size and we both like that there's plenty of room for toe wiggling. The color is really nice - I got gray. My son says they are comfortable, and for a kid that doesn't like wearing shoes, that's a win.  There are two detractors, however. 1. The shoes are loose on his heel. If we cinch the velcro really tight, he's content with them, but it's something to be aware of. 2. These are not super high quality shoes. I got them to be "church" shoes so the shoes should last us well enough. I don't think they would hold up to a lot of rough and tumble use.  5 stars for comfort and style, but took away a star for quality.
